title: Will the eSIM (primary sim) profile on my Pixel 4a get deleted if I factory reset the phone?
content:
I am using  Pixel 4a as my daily driver and my primary sim is downloaded as an eSIM on this device. Now I am planning to do a factory reset of my phone but before that I need to know whether my eSIM profile will get deleted after doing this factory reset?

Please Help..
